pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants; Shoes plus socks; Waterproof gloves; Protective eyewear

Active_Ingredients.name: Mono- and di-potassium salts of Phosphorous Acid

Safety_Information.general_Info: Harmful if swallowed. Causes moderate eye irritation. Avoid contact with eyes or clothing. Wear appropriate protective eyewear. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling and before eating, drinking, chewing gum, using tobacco, or using the toilet.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes. Remove contact lenses if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing eye. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call a poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice. Have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow. Do not induce vomiting unless told to do so by a poison control center or doctor. Do not give anything by mouth to an unconscious person.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Have the product container with you when calling a poison control center or doctor or going for treatment. You may also contact EMERGENCY TELEPHONE NUMBERS: (800) 222-1222 POISON CONTROL CENTER (human health); (888) 426-4435 ASPCA (animal health).
